channel.title: Help! insane monster hits!
channel.description: ok lol i have a problem with phonescape monsters are hittin insalely! like guards hit 20-25. and demons have like 5k hit points and hit like 60+. and other monsters like jad, are hitting less than 10-15. another problem is the hp counter above heads is weird. sometime guards die and i hit like 22 on them. other times i can hit 23-24 on them. and like for example guards hp counter shows up like 223/22. i have a 9k level max on my server so im capable of hitting this. is it showing up like that because im hitting that much? thanks. any help appriciated.

item.title: Help! insane monster hits!
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

[quote=“chris lol, post:3, topic:216767”]so what the fuck do i change in those? give me an example. im to lazy to go figure it out[/quote]first, you will never get anywhere if your lazy. second, get the fuck out. we dont want lazy people here. if you dont want to do it yourself, dont do it at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! insane monster hits!
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Change the HP and Combat level of the NPC in NPC.cfg, to something more reasonable.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! insane monster hits!
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

so what the fuck do i change in those? give me an example. im to lazy to go figure it out

item.title: Help! insane monster hits!
item.dc:creator: @darkness101 darkness101
item.description:
@darkness101 wrote:

In some servers, maybe all, dependant on the hp in npc.CFG, the enemy will hit higher.

On other servers, how high they hit should be in client.JAVA or npchandler.JAVA.

Read full topic
